fork_status_and_schedule.highlight: Dec 22/25/29 and Jan 1 calls cancelled; Jan 5 ACDT converted to ACDE
FOCIL CFI'd for Hegotá (H-star); headliner process to begin in January
Hegotá timeline: Jan 8-Feb 4 headliner proposals, Feb 5-26 finalization

repricing_updates.highlight: Targeting 60 Mgas/s floor; ~18 operations need price increases
EIP-7904 downscoped to floor enforcement only; cost reductions removed for now
State growth decision (8037/8073/8075) postponed to January 5th for better benchmarks

testing_progress.highlight: State benchmarks running on mainnet/2x/4x snapshots; infrastructure being improved

organizational.highlight: Ansgar to continue hosting through Jan 5; Tim returns after
zkEVM roadmap doc published; feedback requested in L1ZKVM channel

action_items.action: Review zkEVM roadmap and provide feedback in ETH R&D L1ZKVM channel
Publish Hegotá timeline as blog post
Complete state benchmark infrastructure for mainnet/2x/4x snapshots
Review Guillaume's Twitter thread on EIP-8032 transition mechanism

decisions.decision: Fork name finalized: Heze (CL) + Bogotá (EL) = Hegotá
CFI: EIP-2780, EIP-7904 (downscoped), EIP-7976, EIP-7981, EIP-8038

targets.target: January 5th - ACDE call to finalize Glamsterdam scope
February 8th - Hegotá headliner proposal window opens
